document.full_text: in 'mimic,' at the irish arts center, raymond scannell's tragic tale about a life gone off the rails is punctuated by bursts of melody, sound effects and impersonations.
document.title: theater review | 'mimic': confession of a multi-voiced madman
lines_and_colors: in 'mimic,' at the irish arts center, raymond scannell's tragic tale about a life gone off the rails is punctuated by bursts of melody, sound effects and impersonations.
